content: through all 9 loops 5 continue with the next stitch as per the pattern 💡 a puff is often finished with a chain 1 to secure it however to keep the stitch count consistent and avoid small holes omit this step in this pattern 💡 keep your yarn overs and loops loose if they are too tight it will be difficult to pull through all the loops at the end 💡 once you finish the puff push it from the back to make it pop out on the right side of your work instructions the images in the instructions show pink yarn rather than white as it is easier to see keyring attaching a keychain is completely through the magic_ring of the 1 i prefer to use a snap hook with a solid d-ring rather than body proceed to make a single_crochet split key ring loops as i find that split key ring loops tend to snag
